channel.title: New Version of SCAR Problems
channel.description:
Hello I am new to SCAR and by your definition, I suppose I am considered a leecher. I do not yet understand scripting and I would like to become better at it. If anyone is still reading my thread at this point then would you be interested in helping me. I tried to load an auto mining rune ess script into SCAR 3.13. I am using SRL 4.0 which I used subversion with. However when I attempt to run the script I am given an error.
Failed when compiling Line 54: [Error] (56:51): Duplicate identifier 'UpChars' in script C:\Program Files\SCAR 3.13\Scripts\Downloads\SSi2.txt
This is the script and if you could help me I would appriciate it very much. I have read that it is important to use more recent scripts with this new version of SCAR however I have yet to find any "new" versions. If you know where to find new versions or know how to edit this one so it will workm please post. Once again thank you for your time and please help me if you can.

item.title: New Version of SCAR Problems
item.dc:creator: @Renax Renax
item.description:
@Renax wrote:

i was targeting your response, not the actual question of the thread. off-topic yes, but thats not the point right now.

Your post should be disregarded because, saying that essence miner’s are “bullshit” is a false statement. besides from that it is a discouraging message.

maybe i’m just set in my ways but i miss the days when the site was about progressive idea’s, and encouragement

Read full topic

item.title: New Version of SCAR Problems
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

[quote=“Renax, post:14, topic:162211”]Did i say that your post was wrong? i believe that your post was useless and i would like people to disregard it, but i never said it was wrong.

I just don’t want people to get discouraged from coding/using a certain type of script because it’s a challenge to code in scar. coding for any language isn’t about “the easy way out,” which you seemed to be promoting. I was holding up the other end of the argument by playing the “a little hard work never killed anyone” card.[/quote]

You provided no reasons as to why my post should be disregarded.

He’s not asking how to code or anything. He just wants to use a working ess miner. So check what the question is before offering your advice.

Read full topic

item.title: New Version of SCAR Problems
item.dc:creator: @Renax Renax
item.description:
@Renax wrote:

Did i say that your post was wrong? i believe that your post was useless and i would like people to disregard it, but i never said it was wrong.

I just don’t want people to get discouraged from coding/using a certain type of script because it’s a challenge to code in scar. coding for any language isn’t about “the easy way out,” which you seemed to be promoting. I was holding up the other end of the argument by playing the “a little hard work never killed anyone” card.

Read full topic

item.title: New Version of SCAR Problems
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

Renax:

Everyone should disregard this post, coding a working essence miner for scar is entirely possible and is a very interesting challenge for any scripter.

You post did nothing to show that my post is wrong. You did not contradict any of the precepts laid down in my post.

Read full topic

item.title: New Version of SCAR Problems
item.dc:creator: @Renax Renax
item.description:
@Renax wrote:

xxlegitxx:

Ess mining scripts are the biggest scam/bullshit ever. RS has so many tricks up their sleeve (all shades of gray, teleport to random locations) that the time spent making a good ess miner script could have just as easily been used towards an iron mining script. And I’ve been leeching IBot ImpMiner for a while, and running it for a few nights, I have 58 mining and half a mil in iron ore.

Everyone should disregard this post, coding a working essence miner for scar is entirely possible and is a very interesting challenge for any scripter.

Read full topic

item.description:

Thats not a bad idea. Thanks for you post!

item.title: New Version of SCAR Problems
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

Like, don’t even consider using that script or a newer version. What does it do? Head over to http://srl-forums.com/forum/free-all-scripts-f268.html and get some SRL scripts there.

item.title: New Version of SCAR Problems
item.dc:creator: @MopGuy MopGuy
item.description:
@MopGuy wrote:

Unfortunately, the script is too large to post so if you would like me to be more specific please ask me for a certain segment of it. It is the SSi2 script that seems to be the problem at the moment. However I have noticed that other problems arise after fixing one of them.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 02, 2007, 02:43:33 PM[/size][hr]I am aware of that that is why I added the part about mentioning where I could find a new version. Thanks for your post though.

Read full topic

item.title: New Version of SCAR Problems

item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

You’re using an outdated script (one year old… an era in terms of macroing). Find a better one.
